front.title: Quality of Service Attributes for Diameter

abstract.t: This document extends the QoSFilterRule AVP functionality of the Diameter Base protocol and the functionality of the QoS-Filter-Rule AVP defined in RFC 4005. The ability to convey Quality of Service information is made available to the Diameter Network Access Server Application, the Diameter Credit Control Application and the Diameter Extensible Authentication Protocol (EAP) Application. Future Diameter applications can easily integrate Quality of Service support in addition to packet filtering.
